cast.overview: After discovering a once-in-a-lifetime player with a rocky past abroad, a down on his luck basketball scout takes it upon himself to bring the phenom to the States without his team's approval. Against the odds, they have one final shot to prove they have what it takes to make it in the NBA.
cast.title: Hustle

cast.overview: Between personal obligations and training for his next big fight against an opponent with ties to his family's past, Adonis Creed is up against the challenge of his life.
cast.title: Creed II

details.biography: Sumier Mention is an American actor born on November 26, 1997 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. He is known for his role in the film Misfits (2015). He has worked on many short film productions and local commercials early in his career. Many of the films went on to win several awards in film festivals.
details.name: Sumier Mention
